channel.title: Plz help me
channel.description: :mad: :( :confused: plz help how do i get my npcs to die cause when i attack them they dont die they sit there and do the dieing emote over and over ill put a pic on! and then when i do resetnpc's none of the npc's are reset they just say when u try and trade em they say this monster has been killed or somthing plz help "http://s998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/?action=view¤t=0034-1.png" target="_blank">
